titles.title: ADA Improvement Act of 2023
ADA Improvement Act of 2023

To amend title III of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 to require an opportunity to correct an alleged violation as a precondition to commencing a civil action with respect to a place of public accommodation or a commercial facility.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
